menu.name: Sonic Options'
menu.desc: Options for Vs Sonic.exe V2. Includes options for indievidual mods.

checkbox.desc: Changes the UI into an older version Kade Engine.
checkbox.name: Kade Engine UI

checkbox.desc: Gives the strum notes higher frames to mimick KE's bot note presses. Kade Engine UI option must be enabled for this to work!
checkbox.name: Faster note press
